page.title: 02In the news 25 May 1985
page.content: ONE LADY KILLED AND TWO MEN INJURED. TWO MEN AND A LADY FROM BRISTOL WERE ON THEIR WAY TO COLEFORD MARKET BUT THEY DID NOT MAKE IT. THE DRIVER WAS POURING A CUP OF COFFEE WHEN HE LOST CONTROL OF THE VAN AND CRASHED INTO A TREE.THE LADY WENT THROUGH THE WIND SCREEN.WHEN THE POLICE ARRIVED THEY FOUND ONE MAN WALKING ABOUT DELIRIOUS. THE LADY WAS UNDER THE VAN AND THE LAST MAN WAS STILL IN THE VAN.THE LADY WAS DEAD BUT THE TWO MEN WERE STILL ALIVE.THEY WERE RUSHED OFF TO GLOUCESTER HOSPITAL.THE ROAD WAS CLOSED FOR ABOUT 2 HOURS.THE 3 PEOPLE IN THE VAN WERE ALL PAKISTANIS.
